snippet.title: Lost Diskettes Vol.1 [Launch Trailer]
snippet.description:
This is a collection of short and experimental horror experiences, focused on surreal and bizarre plots, always maintaining Puko's style.

FEATURES:

• Anthology with 6 different games
• Each game contains a different horror story
• Unlock trophies upon finishing each diskette
• Dialogues with different choices
• Inspired by classics like Tales from the Crypt and The Twilight Zone

WISHLIST NOW ↓

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3120250/Lost_Diskettes_Vol1/
